entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -15.3°C

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
